title: Disenchanted My Snow Day Malzahar Shard. Help Needed
body: So during the project event i got snow day malz out of the special box you get after buying all three icons and today i bought malz but when i a accidentally clicked disenchant because it was green hopefully someone can help me?

replies.body: Unfortunately, there's not much we can do to recover lost shards past the confirmation windows.  So much time has passed as well that any exceptions would be unlikely anyway.  It's super important to take care when performing an action and confirming it.  Hopefully, these legacy skins will make another appearance, but you can also test your luck with mystery gifts too.  Good luck!

Or could i possibly submit a ticket because i saw a similar thread with someone who disenchanted a project fiora skin and if i did what would i submit it under? Im kinda sad i disenchanted it by accident{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Is there any way to refund my purchase of malzahar because that's the onlyear reason I bought him v_v
its gone, no way to help you
